scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=shared && npm run build --workspace=backend
scripts.start: npm run build && concurrently "npm run start:app" "npm run start:backend"
scripts.start:clean: npm run build && concurrently "npm run start:app:clean" "npm run start:backend"
scripts.start:backend: npm run build && npm run start --workspace=backend
scripts.start:backend:dev: npm run build:shared && npm run dev --workspace=backend
scripts.start:app: npm run build:shared && npm run start --workspace=expo-app
scripts.start:app:clean: npm run build:shared && npm run start:clean --workspace=expo-app
scripts.start:android: npm run build:shared && npm run android --workspace=expo-app
scripts.start:ios: npm run build:shared && npm run ios --workspace=expo-app
scripts.start:web: npm run build:shared && npm run web --workspace=expo-app
